name: shopsmart-ai-discount-finder
description: Complete ShopSmart - AI Discount Finder project with frontend, backend, and ML service

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ml-service && python app_simple.py" "cd backend && npm run standalone" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test

author: Vijay Kalore
